description: This file defines an interface class IEventHandler within the WPEFramework::Plugin namespace. The interface declares virtual methods for handling container events such as start, stop, failure, and state change, each accepting a JsonObject reference as a parameter.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: An interface class providing callback methods for container event handling.

methods.name: onContainerStarted
methods.description: Handles the event when a container starts; takes a JsonObject reference with event data.

methods.name: onContainerStopped
methods.description: Handles the event when a container stops; takes a JsonObject reference with event data.

methods.name: onContainerFailed
methods.description: Handles the event when a container fails; takes a JsonObject reference with event data.

methods.name: onContainerStateChange
methods.description: Handles any container state change; takes a JsonObject reference with event data.
